extendedInfo.description: South African National Lottery Application for your Android device.Receive the latest lotto, lotto plus and power ball results directly to your Android device within minutes of the live lottery draw free of charge.Also included is a quick pick number generator to help you select your lottery pickings.This application is brought to you free of charge by Buzybuy.

reviews.title: Hopeless
reviews.comment: Don\'t bother. Does give you the results, but so does the website, where you can see all the draw data and prizes.  To be of any use it needs to give the prizes. It should also be able you store your numbers and check them for you. As it stands, it may as well not have been written!
reviews.author: Justin Barley

reviews.title: No, no, No!!
reviews.comment: Shows only results no payout info.  waste of time!
reviews.author: Deidre Botha

reviews.title: Not working on Galaxy Note II
reviews.comment: The settings tab does nothing, also when I try to view results all I see are black bars, no numbers. Same for Quick pick generator.  Samsung Galaxy Note II running Android 4.1.1  Request. Some folk like me play the same numbers every week - would it be at all possible in a future version to allow us to enter our numbers and store them (up to 10 lines) and for the app to check results and compare with the winning draw?  Update: Wow, issue fixed within 24 hours !! Great stuff.
reviews.author: Andrew Taylor

reviews.title: Really limited and ugly
reviews.comment: Has so little information and uses the official Lotto logo wtf... and is pretty much just an advert. There is a free app on the market called \"SA Lotto\" that has full history, results, stats and a number generator for lotto, plus and powerball and it looks slick!!!
reviews.author: Sean Packham

reviews.title: Mr
reviews.comment: Beautiful application......straight forward. Does what says on my Galaxy Note N7000.
reviews.author: maulana ali

reviews.title: Cool app
reviews.comment: Please can you include how much was won and how many winners in each category same as on site. Besides that the app is cool
reviews.author: Moozie Nkosi

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: Very very nice and good app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: G
reviews.comment: Please add the rand pay outs.
reviews.author: Monica Saraiva

reviews.title: Require a few improvements
reviews.comment: It would be helpful to have the division winner results available. The mail subscription option would also be easier to excess via the app. I like the quick pick generator, especially considering that you can generate several lines with one click.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Come on SA!!!!!????
reviews.comment: What a load of $#!t. Click on results and it is just blank spaces.
reviews.author: Ryan Riley

reviews.title: Winning numbers only!
reviews.comment: No results ie winners,,rollover info etc. Load of rubbish. Must use browser go and get more info. Junk
reviews.author: Trevor Esnouf

reviews.title: Nice, but...
reviews.comment: I second the request to be able to store up to 10 lines of personal numbers : a lot of us play the same numbers every draw. It would be easy to code a check to show winnings. Secondly, it would be useful to see the draw number in the results.
reviews.author: Jon Deane

reviews.title: Cud work
reviews.comment: I wonder is da lotty controled
reviews.author: Sergell Wynand

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Great but improvement is highly appreciated
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs upcoming prize money draws
reviews.comment: As the title suggests.  I want to know when the next 40 mil draw is happening.
reviews.author: Georgie Mathews
